scripts.serve:mac: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && vue-cli-service serve --mode dev
scripts.build: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && vue-cli-service build --mode prod
scripts.build:dev: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && vue-cli-service build --mode dev
scripts.build:test: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && vue-cli-service build --mode test
scripts.build:pre: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && vue-cli-service build --mode pre
scripts.build:prod:mac: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && vue-cli-service build --mode prod
scripts.lint: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && vue-cli-service lint
